name: Cooking Home: Cooking & Design
description:
Are you the Crazy Chef? Are you the master of Home Design? Hurry up and Join Cooking Home to build your dream homecapes with cooking games!

Cook, serve and embrace delectable food in the Cooking Home and feel the beautiful Dream Home! Cooking Home is much more than just a Simple, Relaxing, and Fast-Paced cooking game. We perfectly combine the popular decoration and cooking gameplay styles together to provide you an unusual happiness from those traditional, outdated cooking games!

As a Star Chef and the Host of Cooking Home, you are going to cook cuisines as well as customize all the furniture and decorations with fine graphics! Foodies from all over world will come to taste your cooking! On this cooking & design journey, you will experience:

Super Fun of Cooking Games
- Add the correct pieces of ingredients to cook the worldwide cuisines!
- Serve the customers timely to make them happy!
- Cook the correct dishes that customers ordered!
- Enjoy tons of challenging levels!
- Improve your cooking skill and cook worldwide food in real life!
- Broaden your knowledge about the unique recipes!
Design Dream Home Games
- Unlock and Renovate various Rooms!
- Decorate with unique furniture and decors!
- Social with friends and other players!
- Decide what the house will look like!
- Create amazing combinations of furnishings!
- Claim valuable and fabulous rewards when you finish your design!

Cooking Home is completely FREE to play. You will be able to enjoy all the home and cooking trip without spending a dime! In addition, you can purchase items via real money to help you finish your room or cooking levels in the game. Write your cooking stories and create the legendary in the town. It's time to found your colorful cooking world!

No matter who you are, a madness chef, interior designer or just an ordinary person? You can have full fun here! We offer you:

- Various cuisines and drinks!
- Inimitable decorations and stories!
- Energetic gameplay and exquisite graphics!
- A relaxing and happy playing time!
- Challenge & fast-paced cooking levels!

Are you ready? No time to waste! Come on Now!
